DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Green tea extract ( Polyphenon E ) contain ingredient may prevent development cancer . PURPOSE : This phase I trial study well green tea extract work prevent cancer healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Green Tea Extract ( Polyphenon E ) Preventing Cancer Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine effect green tea extract ( Polyphenon E ) cytochrome P450 enzyme activity glutathione S-transferase activity level healthy participant . Secondary - Determine safety tolerability drug participant . OUTLINE : This open-label study . Participants receive oral green tea extract ( Polyphenon E ) daily 4 week absence unacceptable toxicity . Participants follow 2 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 44 participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Healthy individual Nonsmokers More 1 year since smoke cessation No concurrent smokers No regular consumption large amount alcohol On average , ≤ 3 alcoholic drink per week Consumes < 6 cup glass tea per week PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 18 Performance Status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Not specify Hepatic Bilirubin ≤ 2.0 mg/dL AST ALT ≤ 2 time normal Alkaline phosphatase ≤ 2 time normal Renal Creatinine ≤ 1.5 mg/dL Cardiovascular Resting systolic blood pressure ≥ 100 mm Hg No hypertension hypercholesterolemia require unscheduled medical visit change treatment within past 3 month Other Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception Willing refrain tea related product oral herbal/botanical supplement study participation Willing limit consumption cruciferous vegetable ≤ week study participation Willing refrain caffeinecontaining food beverage ( e.g. , coffee , cola , chocolate , overthecounter medication ) 72 hour , , 8 hour study drug administration Willing refrain food item affect drug carcinogen metabolize enzyme ( e.g. , grapefruit , grapefruit juice , cruciferous vegetable , food cook charcoal ) 72 hour , , 8 hour study drug administration No difficulty swallow capsule tablets No metabolic disorder know affect study drug No serious acute chronic disease ( e.g. , type I II diabetes , cystic fibrosis , active infection ) No know hypersensitivity green tea probe drug ( e.g. , caffeine , dextromethorphan , losartan , buspirone ) No invasive cancer ( i.e. , nonskin cancer ) within past 5 year PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy Not specify Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy Not specify Surgery Not specify Other More 3 month since prior participation another clinical intervention study No concurrent medication supplement know P450 enzyme inducer inhibitor
